title: I got HACKED! Help please. ;(
body:
So my account was suspended cause me and another player got into it (Obviously) and towards the end of the suspension I decided to log in to buy the chromo skins for IP, and I couldnt log in! I tried recover PW and UN and nothing was being sent to my email.
I went through my email and in the search mail I put "League of Legends" and who ever hacked me also deleted ALL my riot point receipts!
Who ever did it is trying to prevent me from getting my account back. To make things EVER WORSE.. My IP address is now blocked by Riot!!!
So I couldnt even log into my other account which I was monitoring my hacked account for activity and keeping up with the Ticket.
I found this VPN thing and its allowing me to log into my LOL account here (Thank GOD) But this is such a HUGE mess! SO frustrating :(
My life is sh*t and this game is really my only escape and now I cant even play it because someone decided to be an a-hole..

This is day 4 and the only thing Ive gotten back from my support ticket was them telling me to make a new support ticket.... So now Im going to have to wait even longer!! 
Ive put a LOT of time and money into this acc and Im afraid Im going to lose it! :(
If a Riot employee sees this post can you PLS help me??

The summoner name that is hacked is "Catsoop II" idk if you can check something or make them hurry on it but I would GREATLY appreciate it!

replies.body: I looked into this for you and it looks like you've got a handful of tickets, which can cause a delay and confusion in responding to you.  I'd recommend sticking to the one where you've submitted the information that was requested in your initial ticket.  It's been escalated to a specialist who will look further into this.  Account security is very important, and we need to make sure that we're returning the account to its owner.  A specialist will assist you as soon as possible!

the best thing you can do is comply with their requests so that they can in turn help you recover your account. It may take a bit of time but they're the ones doing the job so the more you help them do it the better it will be for you.
